title: Sea area: Forties
creator_credit: John Armstrong, British Petroleum and Pelican Films
brief_description: The exciting story of how the sponsors developed their Forties Field in the North Sea and were the first to bring oil ashore in quantity. The film also shows how BP have endeavoured to respect the surrounding countryside and the wishes and well-being of local people.
